name: Minimal Dark/Light Theme w/ Custom Accent Colours
description: Version: 1.5.3 Remove Ads: I recommend "uBlock Origin". Description: A dark/light theme for KissAnime with custom accent colours and logos Accent Colours and Logo Colours: - Red - Blue - Green Planned Updates: * more custom colours and logos * suggest more features (I will try my best to add them)
additional_info: Changelog v1.5.3: * tweak: added signed by vKarmaHDv logo Changelog v.1.5.2: * misc: added/updated screenshots Changelog v1.5.1: * tweak: added green logo and accent colour Changelog v.1.5: * feature: custom accent colours in a drop down menu Changelog v1.4.2: * tweak: custom colour code changed to drop down menu for background colour, now only Dark/Light Changelog v1.4.1: * tweak: drop down menu for logo Changelog v1.4: * feature: Minimal Design Logo Changelog v1.3.2: * misc: test for custom logo Changelog v1.3.1: * misc: test for minimal logo Changelog v1.3: * feature: custom background colours Changelog v1.2.1: * misc: test for custom accent colours and background colours Changelog v1.2: * tweak: changed the design of the search box for a more minimal look * tweak: removed all the hide ads buttons (AdBlock Required) i recommend "uBlock Origin" Changelog v1.1: * patch: fixed issue where style appeared as a global style Changelog v1: * release: official release to the public
